title: Strong winds, warm temperatures lead to ‘significant growth’ in northern Alberta wildfires
headline: Strong winds, warm temperatures lead to ‘significant growth’ in northern Alberta wildfires
summary: Sunny skies, warm temperatures and gusty winds have prevented Alberta firefighters from getting the upper hand on a number of out-of-control wildfires burning in the province.

title: Early morning incident sends 5 to hospital: Winnipeg police
headline: Early morning incident sends 5 to hospital: Winnipeg police
summary: Five people were taken to hospital — three in critical condition — after a violent incident on Mountain Avenue in Winnipeg early Monday morning.

title: Wheat stuck trading sideways
headline: Wheat stuck trading sideways
summary:
Wheat seems to be floating above the tarrif fray without the wild price swings of other crops.

title: Individualized cattle care makes money and animal welfare sense
headline: Individualized cattle care makes money and animal welfare sense
summary:
Watching beef cattle closely for health problems helps the producer chose the best route forward for both the animal and the farm.

title: Chickpea supplies tight despite large Australian forecast
headline: Chickpea supplies tight despite large Australian forecast
summary: All eyes in the desi chickpea market are on Australia, but an analyst warns you shouldn’t trust what you see.

title: Canada may struggle to find markets for its peas
headline: Canada may struggle to find markets for its peas
summary: Canada will likely be facing more competition in pea export markets this year.
